mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mileage (uuid, recqt, onhqt) SELECT uuid, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(trndt) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(trndt) = MONTH(CURDATE()) THEN recqt ELSE 0 END) AS total_recqt, SUM(recqt) AS current_onhqt FROM pthisttb WHERE uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY uuid;
mapper.update: UPDATE mileage m JOIN ( SELECT uuid, SUM(CASE WHEN YEAR(trndt) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(trndt) = MONTH(CURDATE()) THEN recqt ELSE 0 END) AS total_recqt, SUM(recqt) AS current_onhqt FROM pthisttb WHERE uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY uuid ) AS hist ON m.uuid = hist.uuid SET m.recqt = hist.total_recqt, m.onhqt = hist.current_onhqt, m.mdate = now();
